original_text: The first angel went and poured out his bowl on the land. As a result, very bad and painful sores appeared on people's skin. Everyone who had the wild animal's mark on them and who worshipped the animal's image had those sores.
korean_text: 첫째 천사가 가서 그 대접을 땅에 쏟으매 짐승의 표를 받은 사람들과 그 우상에게 경배하는 자들에게 악하고 독한 종기가 나더라

sentences.original_text: and poured out his bowl on the land
As a result, very bad sores appeared
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 아주 나쁜 종기가 나타났다

sentences.original_text: and painful sores appeared on people's skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아픈 종기가 사람들의 피부에 나타났다

sentences.original_text: Everyone who had the wild animal's mark on them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 위에 들짐승의 표를 가진 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: and who worshipped the animal's image
